title: Is this a self evident truth for Good and Evil? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let me tell you a story - I killed a man the other day… because he was trying to kill me… because I screwed his wife… but this was before they were together… When she used to be a prositute… but she was forced into the lifestyle… Now she forces others into the lifestyle… (Etc.) Moral of the story: Good and evil don’t exist, what does exist is choice. Any choice that makes us feel good (yes helping others while putting yourself down can feel good) is what’s considered a “Good” choice, and any choice that makes us feel bad is considered an “Evil” choice.
